bill_title: Honoring South Dakota Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan for receiving the 2019 Senior Staff of the Year Award from the National Association of Attorneys General in Washington D.C.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring South Dakota Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan for receiving the 2019 Senior Staff of the Year Award from the National Association of Attorneys General in Washington D.C. WHEREAS, Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan started his career with the South Dakota Attorney General's Office in 1991, serving under the last four South Dakota Attorney Generals; and WHEREAS, Charles McGuigan has a wide range of experience, having litigated in areas including Indian law, water, oil and gas mining, wildlife, air quality, solid waste, hazardous waste, nuclear energy, public lands, and forest management; and WHEREAS, Charles McGuigan served as legislative director of the office starting in 1995, and was appointed as Chief Deputy in 2007; and WHEREAS, the managerial skills demonstrated by Charles McGuigan have been invaluable to the Attorney General's Office and have made him an exemplary Chief Deputy Attorney General: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends and honors Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan for receiving the 2019 Senior Staff of the Year Award from the National Association of Attorneys General in Washington D.C., and for his service to the State of South Dakota.

ENTITLED A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring South Dakota Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan for receiving the 2019 Senior Staff of the Year Award from the National Association of Attorneys General in Washington D.C. WHEREAS, Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan started his career with the South Dakota Attorney General's Office in 1991, serving under the last four South Dakota Attorney Generals; and WHEREAS, Charles McGuigan has a wide range of experience, having litigated in areas including Indian law, water, oil and gas mining, wildlife, air quality, solid waste, hazardous waste, nuclear energy, public lands, and forest management; and WHEREAS, Charles McGuigan served as legislative director of the office starting in 1995, and was appointed as Chief Deputy in 2007; and WHEREAS, the managerial skills demonstrated by Charles McGuigan have been invaluable to the Attorney General's Office and have made him an exemplary Chief Deputy Attorney General: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends and honors Chief Deputy Attorney General Charles McGuigan for receiving the 2019 Senior Staff of the Year Award from the National Association of Attorneys General in Washington D.C., and for his service to the State of South Dakota.
